episodes.title: Ep 17 - Speaking Out Against MLM with Julie Anderson
episodes.description:
Our guest this week is one of the anti MLM movements outspoken content creators, Julie Anderson. 

After being a part of Monat for years Julie ‘woke up’ to the cult that is multi level marketing.

Once she did, it became her duty to warn others about the dangers and fraud of this nefarious industry.  

She creates an enormous amount of engaging and hilarious content in the hopes it can help just one person make the decision to exit these scams. 

We talk about what it’s been like to use her voice in this way and some of the backlash she has faced because of it. 

Julie has actively petitioned the FTC and Canadian Competition Bureau to implore them to stop recognizing MLMs as legit businesses. 

We hope you love this chat as much as we did!

episodes.title: Cult Deprogramming with Brandie Hadfield
episodes.description: We are so excited to bring you this conversation with Brandie Hadfield, our first guest on the show! She a wealth of knowledge and her perspective is fascinating when it comes to the psychology behind people who get swept up into commercial cults. She knows it from the lens of a psychotherapist but also as someone who was in one for 10 years, the same one Sandy was in the longest! Brandie is a mother of two based in Toronto, a psychotherapist in clinical supervision, and President of “Flipping the Pyramid,” a non-profit peer support group committed to aiding individuals in their recovery from commercial cults. As an MLM recovery advocate, Brandie believes everyone deserves freedom of mind and speaks out against the abuses of power and coercion perpetrated by MLM scams. You can read her writing on Substack and find her profile on Instagram . We hope you enjoy this interview as much as we did!
